column4: hello room, need some help. how to use camera in ubuntu 9.04?
dr_willis, my webcam is plug n play but i dont know how to use it, any suggest
Dr_willis, i find cheese in update manager?
and cheese doesn't show up in synaptic?
have you done some tweaking to your sources list?
im not sure i do that, because my desktop used by many person in my house
i have open your link, then what should i do?
You probably want to pastebin the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list

per that list, Cheese should be in the standard repostitories since Hardy, (9.04 is Jaunty, i think) so if searching in Synaptic doesn't turn anything up the next step is to make sure the source hasn't been disabled.
but: are you able to launch synaptic and search for other software to install?
yes i am able to do that
so then the next step is to look at sources.list
alternatively, you can look under Settings > Repositories in synaptic.
hmm, repositories in synaptic. i will learn it first. okay
